{"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>Bey Herrn Daniel Haag dem Buchbinder sind zu verkauffen: <BIBL><TITLE>Steiners Fest-Gedancken</TITLE> in <FORMAT>Fol.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>2. fl. 24. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Neues und vollkommenes Gebettbuch</TITLE> in <FORMAT>groß 8vo.</FORMAT> von <AUTHOR>Pfarrer Stehelin</AUTHOR> in <PLACE>St. Gallen</PLACE>, ohngebunden <PRIZE>46. kr.</PRIZE>; gebunden in Leder und Schlotz <PRIZE>fl. 1. 10. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Memoires de Rochester</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> ohngebunden <PRIZE>6. Batzen</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><AUTHOR>Maupertuis</AUTHOR> <TITLE>Anfang der Geographie</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>6. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Messung des Meridians Gradus</TITLE>, <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>12. Batzen</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Satura pars II.</TITLE> <FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> <PRIZE>18. kr.</PRIZE></BIBL> <BIBL><TITLE>Gespräch von den Würmern welche bey Anfang dieses Jahrs auf dem Schnee gefunden worden</TITLE> <PRIZE>8. Rappen</PRIZE>, und viele andere mehr, davon der Bericht bey Ihme zu vernemmen.</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":7,"explanation":"1. Closed the <BIBL> tag for 'Memoires de Rochester', which was previously missing.
2. Changed <PRICE> to <PRIZE> for consistency.
3. Fixed unescaped special characters and replaced garbled unicode sequences (e.g., 'gro 8v.' to 'groß 8vo.').
4. Removed stray Unicode characters (like , ) and replaced with appropriate text or removed as noise.
5. Ensured all <PRIZE> tags are properly closed and not mixed with trailing punctuation.
6. Added missing closing </BIBL> tags where necessary.
7. Standardized format abbreviations (e.g., '8vo.' instead of '8v.')."}

parsed.explanation:
1. Closed the <BIBL> tag for 'Memoires de Rochester', which was previously missing.
2. Changed <PRICE> to <PRIZE> for consistency.
3. Fixed unescaped special characters and replaced garbled unicode sequences (e.g., 'gro 8v.' to 'groß 8vo.').
4. Removed stray Unicode characters (like , ) and replaced with appropriate text or removed as noise.
5. Ensured all <PRIZE> tags are properly closed and not mixed with trailing punctuation.
6. Added missing closing </BIBL> tags where necessary.
7. Standardized format abbreviations (e.g., '8vo.' instead of '8v.').
